articles.title: Ex-Barcelona president Bartomeu among those arrested in club raids - sources - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Former Barcelona president Josep Maria Bartomeu and CEO Oscar Grau have been arrested following a raid at the club's offices, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: Former Barcelona president Josep Maria Bartomeu, his adviser Jaume Masferrer, the club's CEO Oscar Grau and head of legal services Roman Gomez Ponti have been arrested following a raid at the club's … [+3588 chars]
